snippet.title: THE KING IN THE SHADES - Trailer 01
snippet.description:
A classic late-90s / early 2000s narrative driven survival-horror game ! (Fixed camera/tank controls design, limited inventory space)
[in active-development] 🕹️

Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2504640/THE_KING_IN_THE_SHADES/
